domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

entity.name: UK still ‘not past’ the coronavirus peak, Foreign Secretary Raab says in briefing
entity.description:
- Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab says government is ‘united in focus’ on coronavirus plans
- Raab also states that the lockdown will not be lifted later this week
- Chief Scientific Adviser Sir Patrick Vallance reports the UK will see an increase in deaths this week followed by a plateau
- Vallance also expects the lockdown to last until mid-May
- The Prime Minister has left the hospital but will not immediately return to work, Downing Street says

text:
"I'm terrified of the economic damage that this will do."

Former Prime Minister Tony Blair says the effects from the coronavirus lockdown could mean that the "government is less able to fund the healthcare system". https://t.co/M8xEtty9um
